title: Alter Ego: The Other Me
description: Would you help kill the world's only superhero if the price were right?For a split second, everyone on the planet was plunged into silent darkness. That night, a masked man dressed all in blue first soared across the Centro sky…Self-centered sleuth Chris Club gets hired to uncover Blue's secret identity. Club despises Blue because he failed to save a child Club considered his only friend.Club's psychopathic boss wants to kill Blue—not for some grand scheme, just to make the whole world sad.The invulnerable superhero with the decapitating uppercut has no reflection, only comes out at night, and never leaves the Centro city limits.As Club unravels the mind-bending truth about who and what Blue is, he starts to care about him. And he realizes if he doesn’t turn his back on his boss, Blue's blood won’t be the only blood on his hands.Half novel. Half graphic novel. A visual mystery you'll obsess over, told in a way you've never seen before. Issue 1 in an 8-issue series.
author: Dave Terruso
